Package com.fincons.util

Provide a set of helper classes, included a configuration helper class, AMQP helper class and a parameter list data transfer object.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BrokerParameterList Represent a support class interface to manage and store information about the operative broker configuration parameters.
 

Class Summary
AMQPConnectionHelper This class encapsulates the definition of AMQP connections and channels.
AMQPConstants This class contains some AMQP Constants
ApplicationPropertiesRepository This class load in memory the properties configuration file called conf.properties.
BrokerParameterListImpl Defines the implementation of the BrokerParameterLis interface, a class to manage and pass structured configuration setting
 

Exception Summary
EnvVariableNotFound This class represent a Missing VM Variable Exception.
 

Package com.fincons.util Description

Provide a set of helper classes, included a configuration helper class, AMQP helper class and a parameter list data transfer object.
